amendatorysection.catchline: Certain sales direct to consumer; producer; registration; contents.
amendatorysection.para: A producer of food described in subdivision (7) of section 81-2,245.01 shall register with the department prior to conducting any sales of food. The registration shall be made on forms prescribed by the department and include (1) the name, address, and telephone number of the producer, (2) the type of food safety and handling education or training course taken and the date of its successful completion, and (3) proof of private well water testing pursuant to subdivision (7)(f) of section 81-2,245.01, if applicable. This section shall not apply to a producer of food selling directly to the consumer at a farmers market.
